buffs.description: Tribe Friendliness for Elf can be increased up to 600 by Windwalker.
buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness

hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it increases the Attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and casts a shield that temporarily grants immunity against physical attacks.
Increases basic game speed by 8% and increases its attack speed and movement speed by 10%.
Increases attack range, movement speed and critical damage of all units by 7%.
Tribe Friendliness for Elf can be increased up to 600 by Windwalker.
description.skill1: Increases the Tribe Friendliness for Elf (30%, 60%, 90%, 120%, 150%)
description.skill2: Increase attack power of Elf units in Outland Battle. (0%, 0%, 4%, 7%, 14%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Windwalker ]
